posts.post_title: FS: t213 Coupon Clark Griffith Type 2 PSA 2 $SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is this t213 Coupon Clark Griffith Type 2 PSA 2. Card has great color and a sharp image. Decent centering. There is vertical creasing to the right of his ear up the entire right border from top to bottom and a little creasing in the middle of the left border.

$SOLD shipped

Price includes shipping. Payment via Paypal 'FF/Gift' or price plus 3% for regular Paypal ONLY. Please PM me to buy or with questions. Thanks.........Matt
